title: Name and Territory of Union
text:
• (1) India, that is Bharat, shall be a Union of States.
  • 7[(2) The States and the territories thereof shall be as specified in the First Schedule.]
  • (3) The territory of India shall compriseâ€”
    • (a) the territories of the States;
    • 7[(b) the Union territories specified in the First Schedule; and]
    • (c) such other territories as may be acquired.

amendments.description: verbiage changed for new State-UT scheme
